intro: SnapCat is a cozy exploration game about finding cats and capturing quiet moments across peaceful islands.
description:
Pack your things, we're going on a trip! We're going to visit breathtaking islands and make the most of the summer sun. But remember - the core item in your luggage is your camera!
Aside from admiring the architecture and colorful flora, we have one crucial mission - documenting the furry inhabitants of the islands. Can you find and photograph all of them? 
Grab your camera and get ready for the cat-tastrophe of cuteness! 
No timers, no battles, no pressure—just pure, pawsitive vibes. 

Wander across bright, bubbly islands that feel like an endless summer vacation—but keep your eyes peeled! These fuzzy superstars love to hide, lounge, stretch, and strike suspiciously perfect poses. Aside from taking pictures, you can fill their cute little water bowls to keep them happy, and, most importantly, don't forget to pet them! 

Every photo you take lands in your super-colorful Cat-alog Album, where you can admire your masterpieces, name your new feline friends, and relive every whisker-wiggling moment.

Snap Cat:
Bright colors. Big personalities.
Cats who act like they’re the stars of their own cartoon show.
(And honestly… they kinda are.)

KEY FEATURES: 
- 17 colorful islands full of kitties 
- cozy, stress-free gameplay and feel-good atmosphere
- relaxing music, perfect for unwinding after a long day
- photo album with all your pictures and the option to name the cats
